description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Fight the ghosts through 50 waves of growing danger. Play as a powerful wizard, a mighty warrior or a strategic builder to stop the ghost invasion. Evolve your character in the direction you want. Survive until dawn, or die trying.
description.short: Fight the ghosts through 50 waves of growing danger. Play as a powerful wizard, a mighty warrior or a strategic builder to stop the ghost invasion. Evolve your character in the direction you want. Survive until dawn, or die trying.
